Package datastructure

Class GeneFeature

java.lang.Object
datastructure.GeneFeature
public final class GeneFeature
extends java.lang.Object
Represents and stores information about a gene feature parsed from a `.gff` file.

Internal use to store information about one gene of a reference sequence.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int endPosition
    The end position of the feature.
    java.lang.String featureName
    The name of the feature.
    boolean isSense
    Indicates if the feature is located on the sense strand.
    java.lang.String seqName
    The name of the reference sequence the feature is located at.
    int startPosition
    The start position of the feature.

  • Constructor Details

    • GeneFeature

      public GeneFeature​(java.lang.String seqName, java.lang.String featureName, int startPosition, int endPosition) throws MusialFaultyDataException
      Constructor of GeneFeature.
      Parameters:
      seqName - String represents the reference sequence name the feature is located on.
      featureName - String represents the name of the feature.
      startPosition - Integer 1-based indexed starting position of the feature on the reference sequence.
      endPosition - Integer 1-based indexed end position of the feature on the reference sequence.
      Throws:
      MusialFaultyDataException - If a feature with faulty start and end position is tried to generate, i.e. if the start position is negative, both positions are equal or the start position is lower than the end position.
